thread.section_title: Mavis Discount Tire Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Mavis Discount Tire | mavistire.com
thread.title: Rell
thread.title_full: Mavis Discount Tire reviewed by Rell

author: Rell
title: Rell
text: I dropped my car there after hours n left the key in the drop box they called me the next morning trying to get my wheels off looking for the wheel lock which I loved showing that they was already ready to take care of my car and even through the snow they had my car ready which wasn't expected because of the storm them guys over there are the best I recommend them to everyone they are a no hassle place and have your vehicle fixed and back to you in no time.
